snippet.title: Aporia: Beyond the Valley – PC Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy now:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/573130/Aporia_Beyond_The_Valley/

Aporia: Beyond The Valley is a first person puzzle game set in the world of Ez’rat Qin. Explore a world filled with strange nature, ancient technology, and haunted by a spirit roaming the fog-covered forest. 

With a whole new story and puzzle mechanics, Aporia: Beyond The Valley presents players with the challenge of actively exploring and piecing together a non-linear story of what happened in this mysterious world.

Developed by Investigate North
Published by Green Man Gaming Publishing
